summary:
Prioritised plan for 9 architecture and code quality improvements across CraftCanvas backend and frontend.

P0 items: Centralise duplicated timezone logic (12+ files) into lib/timezone.py, and extract the session store from routers/auth to break a circular import.

P1 items: Delete dead APIKeyMiddleware, split the 34KB timetable router into 3 focused modules, extract a useChat hook to deduplicate chat logic across 6 pages, and break up the 1706-line tasks/page.tsx into 4 focused components.

P2 items: Replace useState<any> with typed state, add Pydantic response schemas, and add error boundaries + useFetch hook.
